attributes.action: Instruct the DWP  to interview everyone on Incapacity Benefit to find out what extra support they need in finding suitable employment
attributes.additional_details:
Going back for fifteen years or more, many  claimants of Incapacity Benefit  have never been kept informed  by Job Centres  of what help and support  was available  to assist them to find suitable employment.
Please instruct the management of the DWP  to write to every  person on Incapacity Benefit  and ask them for ideas on how to improve the service they   SHOULD  be receiving from Job Centres.
